response.job_title: Formulation Scientist | Chemical Engineer | Product Development | Innovation | Cosmetics
response.summary: Post-graduate specialist in product design & development and B.S. in chemical engineering with seven years’ experience over in management project, research, and development in the cosmetic area. Focusing in innovation area, where I have had the opportunity of lead to strategic projects, optimizing process, and formulas achieving reduce product costs.
response.skills: Innovation Development, Product Management, Innovation Management, Easily Adaptable, Technical Analysis, Investigative Research, Technology Trends, Raw Materials, Prototyping, Briefs, Fragrance, Analytical Skills, Product Development, Formulation, Project Management, Research, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Gestión de proyectos, Inglés

profile_positions.description:
• Product news formulation on the design and development stages to fragrances and personal care.
• To make formulation essays in the design stages.
• Exploration new formulas and formats to the category.
• Experience in fragrance evaluation.
• Technical support to innovation area in strategics projects.
• Design Thinking aplication.
• Scrum Methodology
• Agile Project Management in new and current products.
profile_positions.title: Formulation Scientist

profile_positions.description:
• Topic: Synthesis, agglomeration, and characterization to scale pilot of a molecular Sieve in spheres  from Zeolite 3A for Dehydration Azeotropic Ethanol.
• Design and construction of equipment on a pilot scale.
• Characterization of raw materials and product finished.
• Process optimization.
• Fits and models of adsorption isotherms and kinetics parameters.
• Project management and budget.
profile_positions.title: Young Researcher

profile_positions.description:
• Production of plasticizers from citric acid using hybrid reaction and separation processes simultaneous.
• Application of the Box Behnken technique for the design experiments.
• Application of final formulation in pilot plant.
profile_positions.title: Research Jr

profile_positions.description:
• Weighing of chemical ingredients for the creation flavors.
• Participation in chemical sensory panels applied to the product.
• Registration and monitoring of formulation according to experimental design.
• Participation in the creation of formulas for emulsions.
profile_positions.title: Creations Flavor Assistant

education.degree_name: Postgraduate Specialist in Product Design and Development

company.name: Belcorp
company.description:
Belcorp has 50 years of experience in direct sales. This corporation is a global leader in beauty and personal care, and markets its products through three comercial brands: L´Bel, Esika and Cyzone. It employs over 7,500 people and has a network of more than 800.000 independents beauty consultants.
 
Belcorp has business operations in 14 countries in the Americas: Bolivia, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, El Salvador, Guatemala, Mexico, Panama, Peru, Puerto Rico and United States. Its main production center is located in Colombia and the company’s headquarters are located in Peru.
 
In 2017, Belcorp was placed 7th among multinationals worldwide by the Great Place to Work Institute. In addition, Direct Selling News magazine placed the Corporation among the 20 largest direct selling companies worldwide. 
 
Women and their development are the heart of the corporation’s purpose. Belcorp is committed to their empowerment, partnering with leading international institutions, such as the Global Compact, for their benefit.

location.address: Parque Industrial Canavita Vereda Canavita Km 22. Tocancipà, Cundinamarca
